'''''Soaring in the Skies of Sary-Ozek''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to keep [[Sorush (Gadget)|Sorush]] in flight for 3 minutes.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The achievement will be completed upon exiting flight.
* Sorush does not need to move for the achievement to be completed.
